tweet.text: May 29, 1988: “The President said that both sides had come a long way since he first wrote to Gorbachev in 1985. History would record the period positively, and that was true not just for our relations.” https://t.co/hC6sfxehaG #FRUS 📷@Reagan_Library https://t.co/XRWZpS4j4K
tweet.html: May 29, 1988: “The President said that both sides had come a long way since he first wrote to Gorbachev in 1985. History would record the period positively, and that was true not just for our relations.” go.usa.gov/xQBQn #FRUS 📷@Reagan_Library
